sections.name: 🔧 Development Services
items: **Minecraft Plugins** — Custom plugins tailored to your server's needs
**BungeeCord Solutions** — Network management and proxy configurations
**API Integrations** — Connect your server with external services
**Database Systems** — MySQL, SQLite, and MongoDB implementations
**Performance Optimization** — Code review and server performance tuning
**Custom Commands** — Unique commands and features for your community

sections.name: 🏗️ Minecraft Building
items: **Spawn Areas** — Professional spawn designs that welcome players
**Hub Worlds** — Central areas connecting multiple game modes
**Adventure Maps** — Custom storylines and challenging quests
**PvP Arenas** — Competitive battlegrounds and tournament venues
**Themed Builds** — Medieval, Modern, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, and more
**Terraforming** — Natural landscapes and custom terrain generation

sections.name: 🎮 Complete Server Solutions
items: **Mini-Games Servers** — Bed Wars, Sky Wars, Murder Mystery, and more
**Factions Gameplay** — Territory control with custom features
**Survival Worlds** — Enhanced vanilla experience with quality-of-life improvements
**SkyBlock Networks** — Island progression with unique challenges
**Prison Servers** — Rank-up systems with custom mines and rewards
**Roleplay Servers** — Immersive experiences with custom mechanics
**DayZ Servers** — Post-apocalyptic survival with custom loot and zones
**Creative Worlds** — Building-focused servers with advanced tools

sections.name: 🗺️ World & Map Creation
items: **Custom Worlds** — Unique terrain generation and biome design
**Adventure Maps** — Story-driven experiences with custom mechanics
**PvP Maps** — Balanced competitive environments
**Lobby Designs** — Impressive first impressions for your players
**Dungeon Systems** — Multi-level challenges with rewards
**City Builds** — Detailed urban environments and infrastructure

sections.name: ⚡ Premium Features
items: **24/7 Support** — Dedicated assistance throughout development
**Source Code Included** — Full ownership of all custom work
**Free Updates** — 30 days of bug fixes and minor improvements
**Documentation** — Comprehensive guides for setup and maintenance
**Performance Guarantee** — Optimized code for maximum server efficiency
**Custom Branding** — Tailored to match your server's identity
